harmful_ingredients.name: Tartrazine
harmful_ingredients.description: Synthetic yellow dye that can cause hyperactivity and allergic reactions

harmful_ingredients.description: Red synthetic dye that may cause hyperactivity and allergic reactions

harmful_ingredients.name: Brilliant Blue FCF
harmful_ingredients.description: Blue synthetic dye that may cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals

harmful_ingredients.name: Sodium Nitrite
harmful_ingredients.description: Preservative that can form cancer-causing nitrosamines

harmful_ingredients.description: Preservative that converts to nitrite and can form nitrosamines

harmful_ingredients.name: Monosodium Glutamate
harmful_ingredients.description: Flavor enhancer that can cause sensitivity reactions in some people

harmful_ingredients.name: Aspartame

harmful_ingredients.name: Acesulfame Potassium
harmful_ingredients.description: Artificial sweetener that may have carcinogenic properties

harmful_ingredients.name: Sucralose
harmful_ingredients.description: Artificial sweetener that may affect gut bacteria

harmful_ingredients.name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene
harmful_ingredients.description: Synthetic antioxidant that may be carcinogenic

harmful_ingredients.name: Butylated Hydroxyanisole
harmful_ingredients.description: Synthetic antioxidant classified as possibly carcinogenic

harmful_ingredients.name: Propyl Gallate
harmful_ingredients.description: Antioxidant that may cause allergic reactions and liver problems

harmful_ingredients.name: Sodium Benzoate
harmful_ingredients.description: Preservative that can form benzene (carcinogen) when combined with Vitamin C

harmful_ingredients.name: Propylene Glycol

harmful_ingredients.name: Partially Hydrogenated Oil

harmful_ingredients.name: Carrageenan

harmful_ingredients.name: Caramel Color IV
harmful_ingredients.description: Caramel coloring that may contain carcinogenic compounds

harmful_ingredients.name: Saccharin

harmful_ingredients.name: Polysorbate 80

harmful_ingredients.name: Sodium Sulfite
harmful_ingredients.description: Preservative that can trigger severe asthma attacks in sensitive individuals

harmful_ingredients.name: Potassium Sorbate
harmful_ingredients.description: Preservative that may cause skin irritation and allergic reactions

harmful_ingredients.name: Calcium Propionate
